modName: Dual Flurry - Two-handed One-handed and Unarmed Weapons
summary: Makes the Dual Flurry perk also apply to unarmed and two-handed.
descriptionHtml:
Makes the Dual Flurry perk also apply to unarmed(weapons), Two-handed and One-handed with Spell/Shield/Misc.


[heading][color=yellow]Installation[/color][/heading]
Either use NMM to download and install or copy the Data folder into your Skyrim Installation and overwrite when asked.
Then activate the ESP either with NMM, the launcher or some other tool.


[heading][color=yellow]Uninstall[/color][/heading]
Deactive the mod with NMM or delete the file ../Skyrim/Data/Dual Flurry for all.esp


[heading][color=yellow]Incompatibility[/color][/heading]
Anything that edits the spell that the Dual Flurry perk applies to your character.


[heading][color=yellow]Known Bugs[/color][/heading]
None currently known


[heading][color=yellow]Credits[/color][/heading]
Thanks to Bethesda for creating the game
Thanks to Dave Humphrey for making SkyEdit


[heading][color=yellow]Tools Used[/color][/heading]
Creation Kit


[heading][color=yellow]Licensing/Legal[/color][/heading]
You can use the file however you like just remember to give credits where due.
author: ErikRedbeard

files.name: Dual Flurry for all
files.changelogHtml:
Re-created with the Creation Kit
